Kementerian ESDM Buka Formasi CPNS Tahun Ini
04 Nov 2019, 01:57 by Ai Rika Rachmawati
BANDUNG, (PR).- Kementerian Energi dan Sumber Daya Mineral (ESDM) kembali membuka lowongan Calon Pegawai Negeri Sipil (CPNS) tahun ini. Pembukaan CPNS tersebut dilakukan serentak dengan seluruh Kementerian/Lembaga serta Pemerintah Daerah di seluruh Indonesia.
Kepala Biro Komunikasi Layanan Informasi Publik dan Kerja Sama (KLIK) Kementerian ESDM, Agung Pribadi, mengatakan, pendaftaran CPNS Kementerian ESDM akan dilakukan pada 11-24 November 2019. Pendaftaran dilakukan secara online, melalui https://sscasn.bkn.go.id/.Â 
"Untuk tahun ini, peserta hanya bisa mendaftar pada satu instansi juga satu formasi di kementerian/ lembaga/pemda," ujarnya, melalui siaran pers yang diterima "PR", Minggu, 3 November 2019.
Untuk formasi CPNS yang dibuka Kementerian ESDM tahun ini, menurut dia, akan diumumkan pada 11 November. Untuk itu, ia mengingatkan agar pelamar segera menyiapkan dokumen persyaratan sejak awal.
Dokumen persyaratan yang harus disiapkan, antara lain: scan Kartu Tanda Penduduk (KTP), pas foto dan swafoto, ijazah serta transkrip untuk memastikan jurusan pelamar sesuai dengan formasi yang dituju. Sedangkan untuk formasi yang dibutuhkan, menurut dia, akan diumumkan segera di kanal resmi Kementerian ESDM.
"Bagi yang tertarik mengabdi membangun sektor ESDM, diharapkan segera menyiapkan syarat administrasi dimaksud, dan yang paling penting jangan percaya apabila yang menawarkan bantuan dan meminta imbalan, semua rekruitmen di Kementerian ESDM semua fair dan tidak berbayar," tutur Agung.
Periode pembukaan CPNS akan dilaksanakan pada November, dilanjutkan dengan pengumuman hasil seleksi administrasi pada Desember. Januari akan diumumkan hasil Seleksi Kompetensi Dasar (SKD), Februari pelaksanaan SKD, dan hasilnya akan menjadi dasar pelaksanaan Seleksi Kompetensi Bidang (SKB) yang akan dilaksanakan pada Maret 2020.
Sebagai informasi, tahun ini Pemerintah membuka 152.250 formasi CPNS yang tersebar di 68 kementerian/lembaga (K/L) dan 462 pemerintah daerah (Pemda).***

Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources Opens CPNS Formation This Year
Nov 04 2019, 01:57 by Ai Rika Rachmawati
BANDUNG, (PR) .- The Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources (ESDM) is re-opening the vacancy for Prospective Civil Servants (CPNS) this year. The opening of the CPNS was carried out simultaneously with all Ministries / Institutions and Regional Governments throughout Indonesia.
Head of the Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources' Public Information and Cooperation Communication (KLIK) Office, Agung Pribadi, said that the registration of the CPNS of the Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources will be conducted on 11-24 November 2019. Registration is done online, via https://sscasn.bkn.go.id /.
"For this year, participants can only register at one agency as well as one formation at the ministry / agency / local government," he said, through a press release received by "PR", Sunday, November 3, 2019.
According to him, the CPNS formation opened by the Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources this year will be announced on November 11. For this reason, he reminded applicants to immediately prepare the required documents from the beginning.
Required documents that must be prepared, among others: scan of Identity Card (KTP), passport and photo selfies, diplomas and transcripts to ensure the applicant majors in accordance with the intended formation. As for the formation needed, according to him, it will be announced soon on the official channel of the Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources.
"For those who are interested in serving the ESDM sector, they are expected to immediately prepare the administrative requirements, and most importantly do not believe if those who offer assistance and ask for compensation, all recruitments at the Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources are all fair and not paid," said Agung.
The CPNS opening period will be held in November, followed by the announcement of the results of administrative selection in December. January will be announced the results of the Basic Competence Selection (SKD), February the SKD implementation, and the results will be the basis for the implementation of the Field Competency Selection (SKB) which will be held in March 2020.
For information, this year the Government opened 152,250 CPNS formations spread across 68 ministries / institutions (K / L) and 462 local governments (Pemda). ***
